00000111000001000000000000000101
// Linha 11: add r0 #1
00001011000000100000000000000001
// Linha 12: add r3 10101010
00001100000001000100100010101010
// Linha 1: add r1 #8
00000001000000100001100000001000
// Linha 2: add r2 #16
00000010000000100011000000010000
// Linha 3: add r3 #32
00000011000000100100100000100000
// Linha 4: add r4 r1
00000100000000000110000000011000
// Linha 5: halt
00000101111111111111111111111111
